author: m.kalinin
content: <@!301186049323958275> Thanks a lot for your work on descriptions to the block tags. I have created a document that is using your suggestions as the basement with a little modification: https://hackmd.io/T8LBBP6HSLqGFWM8ikQakA. I suggest to have a round of review in the hackmd doc and then move the result to the PR -- should be more convenient.
